column5: Cabin 2 sleeps up to six people with a king size master bed, queen size guest bed and a small pull out sofa bed that will work for 1 or 2 kids. Downstairs has a den and a kitchen . The private master bedroom has a king bed and a private bathroom with whirlpool soaking tub. Washer and dryer are located in the master closet. Upstairs in the loft is the second bedroom with a queen size bed and a private full bathroom with a shower/tub combination .
